title: C# 14 Language Features
description: Collection topic covering key C# 14 language features including the `field` keyword in properties, first-class Span types, unbound generic types in `nameof`, enhanced lambda parameters, partial events and constructors, Extensions, null-conditional assignment, user-defined compound assignment operators, and expression tree improvements. Each feature enhances developer productivity and safety with modern syntax.
